Uses of Interface
osyfe.Overlay

  • Packages that use Overlay 
    Package Description
    osyfe
    Welcome to the Osyfe Game Library.
    osyfe.gui
    Provides standard gui elements with automatic input handling and rendering.

    • Uses of Overlay in osyfe

      Methods in osyfe with parameters of type Overlay 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean Screen.active(Overlay overlay)
      Checks if this overlay is currently added to the screen.
      static void Screen.addOverlay(Overlay overlay)
      Adds this overlay on top.
      static void Screen.open(Overlay overlay)
      Opens the game window, adds the given overlay to it and starts the game loop.
      void InputEvent.pass(Overlay overlay)
      Passes this event to the next overlay.
      static void Screen.removeOverlay(Overlay overlay)
      Removes this overlay.

    • Uses of Overlay in osyfe.gui

      Classes in osyfe.gui that implement Overlay 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GUIOverlay
      A customizable GUI overlay with all methods implemented.
